Package game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Alien
    The class representing the alien as seen ingame.
    AlienListnener
    The Listener to be used to detect if a projectile collides with an alien triggering a game over
    Asteroid
    The base class for all the asteroids
    asteroidSpawningTask
    The class used to create asteroids
    Background
    A class representing the background image to be used
    Game
    A world with some bodies.
    GameLevel
    A class representing each of the gamelevels a game can have
    GameOverScreen
    The screen to be shown when the user runs out of lives
    GameWorld
    Outdated and unused now
    LargeAsteroid
    A class representing a large asteroid
    Level1
    The information used for Level 1
    Level2
    The information used in Level 2
    Level3
    The information used in level 3
    LoadGame
    The class used to read data from a file
    MediumAsteroid
    A class representing a medium Asteroid
    MenuBar
    A class used to show the menu bar (on the right)
    MouseHandler
    A class used to fire projectiles
    MyView
    A class used to set the background image in a game
    PolygonEditor
    Very basic polygon editor.
    Projectile
    The Projectile class
    ProjectileCollision
    The class used to calculate what happens if a projectile collides with something
    SaveGame
    A class used to save the game (write data)
    Score
    A class used to display the score board
    Ship
    The ship class
    ShipCollision
    The class used to deal with collisions with the ship
    ShipMovement
    A class used to move the ship
    ShipRotation
    A class used to rotate the ship
    Shop
    unused class -for future development
    SmallAsteroid
    A class representing the small Asteroids used
    Wall
    A class used for the walls
    WallListener
    A class used to deal with collisions asteroids have with walls
